name: Smuggle Buddies (Cozy Pitch)
description:
ONE OF FOUR GAMES IN COZY PITCH PACKSmuggle Buddies is one of four short games in the Cozy Pitch Pack. Each game is a polished idea that we know can turn into something much bigger. Vote for your favorite using the in-game menus and the winner gets expanded in a sequel. Cast your vote and make your voice heard!FEATURES
Play with your friends to beat up monsters and protect your loot in this hack-and-slash game! Switch between different classes and survive against a variety of enemies. Play locally or online in this co-op hack-and-slash action game.


HACK AND SLASH COMBAT: Simple combat that's action oriented. No hotkeys or spell cool-down timers so you can focus dodging and smashing up enemies.


MULTIPLE PLAYABLE CLASSES: Switch between different classes, each with their own style of attacks.

ONLINE AND LOCAL MULTIPLAYER: Play cooperatively both locally or online.COZY GAME PALS: We are a duo of experienced creatives. Bryan is the coder, he has worked on Journey, The Last of Us, and Uncharted 4. Crista is the is the artist, she has worked at Cartoon Network, Nickelodeon, FOX, and Warner Bros. We are working together as Cozy Game Pals to add variety to the types of games you can play.
